entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
